import React from "react"; import { useSelector } from "react-redux"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import CheckoutSteps from "./CheckoutSteps"; export default function Placeorder(props) { const cart = useSelector((state) => state.cart); if (!cart.paymentMethod) { props.history.push("/Payment"); } const toPrice=(num)=>Number(num.toFix(2)); //5,123 => "5.12"=> 5.12 cart.itemsPrice=toPrice(cart.cartItems.reduce((a,c)=>a+c.qty*c.price, 0)) return ( <>

  • Shipping

    Name: {cart.shippingAddress.fullName}
    Address: {cart.shippingAddress.address}, {cart.shippingAddress.address.city}, {cart.shippingAddress.address.postalCode}, {cart.shippingAddress.address.country}

  • Payment

    Method: {cart.paymentMethod}

    • Order Items

      {cart.cartItems.map((item) => (

    • {item.name}

      {item.price} €

      • ))}
); }
